entry.value: select d.documentId, d.name, d.location, d.description as doc_desc, d.typeId, d.created, d.modified, t.name as type_name, t.description as type_desc, t.extension from documents d join types t on d.typeId = t.typeId

select d.documentId, d.name, d.location, d.description as doc_desc, d.typeId, d.created, d.modified, t.name as type_name, t.description as type_desc, t.extension from documents d join types t on d.typeId = t.typeId where d.documentId = ?

select d.documentId, d.name, d.location, d.description as doc_desc, d.typeId, d.created, d.modified, t.name as type_name, t.description as type_desc, t.extension from documents d join types t on d.typeId = t.typeId where t.name = ?
insert into documents (documentId,name,location,description, typeId, created, modified) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update documents set name = ?, location = ?, description = ?, typeId = ?,modified = ? where documentId = ?
